Armada


Armada: Baby? That doesn't sound like you..But, anyway, where are =
you?

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 4:01 AM
  Subject: Re: Big=
 Post(with fries)


  Airbomber: I'm here with Time Warp, come on baby, you=
 know it's me! I'm black and white, I change into a cheetah, well I used to=
, but I like my robot mode, and I got inhaled by that guy, remember?...
   =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
    Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM
    Subject: Re: Big Post(=
with fries)


    Armada



    Armada: Airbomber? How can I be sure that's=
 you?


    (Armada awaits an answer.)
      ----- Original Message ----- 
=
      From: Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: =
Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:32 AM
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  =
    Arrow puts Airbomber on.

      Airbomber: Infectra? Is that you really=
?...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: *Orchid* 
        =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
  =
      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


        Armada



        Armada:=
 Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess...


       =
 (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.)

          ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
          From: Soulstice Omega 
          To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
          S=
ubject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


          Arrow: Hera that, Airbomber? S=
he USED to be Infectra!

          Airbomber: You can't fool me, you just g=
ot someone who sounds just like her to pose as her...LET ME TALK TO HER!

 =
         Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, Infectra. I mean, Armada...=

            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: *Orchid* 
    =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, March 18, 200=
1 3:10 AM
            Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


            Armad=
a



            (Armada listens to the voice coming over her commlink.)


=
            Armada: Actually, no. But that was my original name. I'm Armada=
 now. Who is this?


            (Armada says into the commlink and awaits =
an answer from Arrow.)

              ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
       From: Soulstice Omega 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
           Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
              Subject: R=
e: Big Post(with fries)


              Airbomber: But where do we go?

   =
           Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

=
              Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, a=
nd I seen this as well.

              Stranato: I didn't see it, but I bel=
ieve it.

              Airbomber: But how can that be?

              Arro=
w: Call her.

              Airbomber: I tried that.

              Arrow: =
You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

             =
 Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

              Arrow: Is there anyone name=
d Infectra there?...

                ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
         From: Alloran2@... 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
                Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 4:56 PM
                Su=
bject: Big Post(with fries)


                OOC: Please add the new Destr=
on base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
                Syria. 

     =
           :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

                Ramjet=
: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
   =
             by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of =
the Maximals 
                and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfort=
ress, the base a large faction 
                of Predacons.  There are th=
ree Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
                be able t=
o work out an Alliance with them. 
                ~~~~~ 
                W=
heeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) =

                ~~~~~ 
                Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we shoul=
d first go to the Maximals, for they will 
                be the most like=
ly to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
                Maxi=
mals, so be ready for anything. 
                ::he walks out of his cave=
 and starts flying to the CF:: 
                ~~~~~ 
                ::Ti=
me Warp was releived that they were friends, until he heard what they 
    =
            said about Infectra:: 
                Time Warp: Infectra?! In=
 the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she 
                defina=
tely wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
     =
           guys are fools.

ubject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
